=== Current Issues ===
I'm running Ubuntu 6.04, Dapper Drake currently with actual kernel (2.6.15-18-686), the SD card Ricoh Co Ltd R5C822 SD/SDIO/MMC/MS/MSPro Host Adapter (rev 17) (prog-if 01) are now recognized.

The green led for wifi doesn't work
